Reviews.Title: Security is a great feeling and its in color
Reviews.Author: c b
Reviews.Content: Awesome set up I havent had a problem with the system I bought my mom. I love the mobile remote view and the motion alarm. These products were a little pricy but when i got it hooked up it was worth it. Her system works great and it gives me piece of mind since we live far apart.

Reviews.Title: Do Not Waste Your Time And Hard Earned Money
Reviews.Author: Curti
Reviews.Content: This is one of those products where paying more does not buy you quality. It is evident that Lilin has poor standards in Quality Control! I was disappointed by a few things: When I paused during playback, the picture distorted making it hard to make out a face; when scrolling through the DVR menu, there was an intermittent problem where the text would become garbled; and lastly Lilin Customer Support was poor at best. It was very frustrating to talk to tech support because they conveyed disbelief when I explained my problem with their product.In addition, it is not mentioned in the product description but this system is not color--playback is in black and white.
